solution_line_template: The daughter and her {num_girls} friends each want {servings_per_girl} servings of pancakes so that's {num_girls}*{servings_per_girl} = <<{servings_per_girl}*{pancakes_per_serving}={total_girl_servings}>>{total_girl_servings} servings of pancakes

Willow's son wants {son_servings} servings of pancakes and the girls want {total_girl_servings} so that's {son_servings}+{total_girl_servings} = <<{son_servings}+{total_girl_servings}={total_servings}>>{total_servings} servings of pancakes

Each serving makes {pancakes_per_serving} pancakes and Willow needs to make {total_servings} servings for a total of {pancakes_per_serving}*{total_servings} = <<{pancakes_per_serving}*{total_servings}={total_pancakes}>>{total_pancakes} pancakes
